sitedata.metadesc: Trusted By Fine Real Estate Professionals

about.abouttext2: Pinecliff is a community 15 minutes west of downtown Colorado Springs. This quiet neighborhood offers a variety of custom and semi-custom homes on lots that feature everything from Peak and city views to those nestled into wooded hillsides and valleys. Pinecliff's proximity to Ute Valley Park provides some of the best hiking and mountain biking trails in Colorado Springs.
